author: lukaszrozmej
content: Why do we want to do nonce counting in EL for IL: https://github.com/michaelneuder/execution-specs/pull/1#discussion_r1532177401 ?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Because then you would need to have the transactions of the previous block to verify the next block, which makes the state transition function less pure

author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
Rn: state -> block -> new state
Without nonces:
State -> prevBlock, Block -> state
